title: Birds of prey
creator_credit: ERPI Classroom Films and Encyclopaedia Britannica Films
brief_description: Studies the development and habitats of American owls, vultures, eagles, hawks and includes scenes of hunting, nesting and feeding of the young. No other credits available.
